author: generated and refined by: Aron Homberg
name: RaptorGPT - Call of the Hallucinations - Original Soundtrack (OST)
description:
Dive into the synthetic splendor of RaptorGPT, the game that dares to ask, 'Why bother with human creativity when you can let AI do it all?' That's right—every pixel, note, and line of code in this marvel of automation has been churned out by our tireless digital minions. From the throbbing electronic beats to the jarring mishmash of synth and classical music (because, why not?), your ears are in for an adventure.

Prepare to experience gameplay so unpredictably generated you'll start to wonder if the AI is just messing with you. Want textured landscapes that look like your graphic card is having a meltdown? You got it. Crave dialogue so bizarre it feels like eavesdropping on a chatbot support group? We've covered that too.

Blast this suprisingly well-sounding cacophony of AI-generated arcade nostalgia through your speakers courtesy of Suno.ai, because nothing screams 'gaming revolution' like an algorithmic symphony. Coming soon to a very niche corner of itch.io—because, apparently, even indie game platforms need their version of an AI fever dream. Get ready to hit download, roll your eyes, and let the absurdity wash over you. This isn't just a game; it's a digital art piece mocking the very concept of effort - written by ChatGPT.
